messages.content: list the subject verb and object in live in the public eye

subject: I
verb: live
object: in the public eye

As an AI language model, I am not capable of conducting a survey. However, I can provide you with some tips on conducting a survey:

1. Identify the purpose and goals of the survey.
2. Define your target audience and determine the sample size.
3. Develop the questions that will help you achieve the survey goals.
4. Choose the survey method that fits your budget, resources, and audience.
5. Pre-test the survey questions to ensure clarity, accuracy, and bias.
6. Launch the survey and collect responses.
7. Analyze the data collected and draw insights.
8. Present the findings in a clear and concise report that highlights the implications and recommendations.

Remember that the success of a survey depends on the quality of the questions, the reliability of the data collection, and the validity of the analysis.
list the subject verb object in : conduct a survey

subject: you
verb: conduct
object: a survey
